t: Amazon.com: EA Sports 08 Collection - PC : Video Games
s: Purchased this for my son. He loves to play video games and was wanting some sports options for his computer, this was great. He loves being able to have all of the different options. ... The games were easy to install and worked well.

t: Amazon.com: The EA Sports Collection - PC : Video Games
s: The game installed good but when you launched it , it would get stuck in a black windows media player screen. In order to fix it you have to download a software path from ea sports, but it isn`t available anymore. So thanks amazon for selling bad broken products.
